# Phage Genome Report

Mason Park



```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(easystats)
library(plotly)
library(kableExtra)
library(ShortRead)
```


### Data Collection

We collected 101 phage genome assemblies from NCBI with the following filters activated: Viruses, Latest, Complete genome, Exclude anomalous, Exclude partial, RefSeq has annotation. A list of all genome ID's with accession numbers can be found below.
```{r}
path <- list.files(path = "../../Data/Phagefasta/genome_assemblies_fasta",
                   recursive = TRUE,
                   pattern = ".gz",
                     full.names = TRUE,
                   ignore.case = TRUE)

rfa <- readFasta(path)

ShortRead::id(rfa) %>% 
  kable() %>% 
  kable_classic(lightable_options = 'hover') %>% 
  scroll_box(height = "200px")

```
